meanings.definition: The quality or state of being perverse.
meanings.sent1: Her constant perversenesses in class made it difficult for the teacher to maintain order.
meanings.sent2: The perversenesses of the villain in the story made him a truly despicable character.
meanings.sent3: Despite his perversenesses, he always managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The perversenesses of the weather seemed to mirror his tumultuous emotions.
meanings.sent5: The perversenesses of the maze made it nearly impossible to find the way out.

meanings.definition: An instance of behaving in an unreasonable or unacceptable manner.
meanings.sent1: The child's perversenesses at the dinner table caused frustration among the family members.
meanings.sent2: His perversenesses at work led to conflicts with his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The perversenesses of the cat refusing to eat its favorite food amused the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The perversenesses of the old car made it unreliable in crucial moments.
meanings.sent5: Her perversenesses in negotiations made it challenging to reach a compromise.
